properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 8 at 10:30PM EST until February 10 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
* WINDS...South winds increasing to 15 to 25 knots Sunday
morning. Gusts to 30 knots Sunday afternoon. Southwest 10 to
20 knots Sunday evening veering northwest 15 to 20 knots.

* WAVES...1 to 3 feet building to 3 to 5 feet after midnight
Sunday night.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SUNDAY TO 10 AM EST MONDAY
